title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, it doesn't take focus anymore. However, it does take focus if the combo list is dropped down.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
EB: When I click on the first Combo, it should take focus.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.  
2. Press 'Tab' key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
